bookText.htmlContent: Gogmazios are massive elder dragons that consume the sulfur present in the gunpowder to sustain themselves.

Gogmazios are able to fly after igniting their inside using the sulfur and gunpowder they consumed, to burn the oil that covers their body. The oily substance dripping from their bodies is the waste that cannot be digested by their stomach. This oil can also be super-heated and spat out for a powerful and devastating attack.
